text: "I'll Fly for You" is a 1984 song by English new wave band Spandau Ballet and is the second single from their fourth studio album Parade. It went to number 9 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in Ireland, number 6 in Italy, number 38 in Australia, number 35 in New Zealand and number 28 in the Netherlands. ==Track listings== *7-inch single :A. "I'll Fly for You" – 5:11 :B1. "To Cut a Long Story Short" (live) – 5:02 *12-inch single :A. "I'll Fly for You" – 5:34 :B1. "To Cut a Long Story Short" (live) – 5:02 :B2. "I'll Fly for You" (Glide Mix) – 7:13 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Spandau Ballet songs Category:Sophisti-pop songs
title: I'll Fly for You
